architecture_alignment.notes: Workflows use similar agent patterns to ECHOES orchestration layer
Web search and code interpreter tools align with ECHOES tool ecosystem
Conversation history management could enhance ECHOES session handling
Pydantic schemas align with ECHOES data validation patterns

enhancement_suggestions.suggestion: Add ECHOES security scanning to workflow pipelines
enhancement_suggestions.benefit: Ensure all agent interactions meet ECHOES security standards

enhancement_suggestions.suggestion: Integrate ECHOES monitoring agents into workflow execution
enhancement_suggestions.benefit: Track workflow performance and resource usage

enhancement_suggestions.suggestion: Apply trajectory alignment concepts to workflow evolution
enhancement_suggestions.benefit: Enable workflows to learn and improve over time

enhancement_suggestions.suggestion: Implement harmonic resonance patterns for multi-workflow coordination

security_considerations.mitigation: Ensure all workflows use ECHOES secure credential management
Implement ECHOES privacy filters in web search and data collection
Add ECHOES input validation and sanitization layers
Apply ECHOES rate limiting and resource monitoring to all workflows

phase_1.name: Foundation Integration
tasks: Create workflow registry in ECHOES orchestration layer
Implement base workflow runner with ECHOES security integration
Add workflow state persistence using ECHOES data layer

phase_2.name: Core Workflow Integration
tasks: Add Web Research Agent with ECHOES security scanning
Implement Intelligent Query Processing for user interfaces
Deploy Document Comparison workflow for code reviews

phase_3.name: Advanced Features
tasks: Add trajectory alignment for workflow evolution
Implement harmonic resonance for workflow coordination
Create workflow analytics and performance dashboards
Enable cross-workflow data sharing and learning
